WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0800Z TO 2000Z DAILY
   13 THRU 19 DEC IN AREAS:
   A. BOUND BY
      05-42.53S 034-45.02W, 06-09.83S 034-46.82W,
      06-03.93S 034-57.22W, 05-47.03S 034-56.32W.
   B. WITHIN 20 MILES OF 05-54.53S 035-14.92W.
   C. WITHIN 32 MILES OF 05-54.53S 035-14.92W.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 192100Z DEC 18.
